commits.content:
@extends('layouts.app2') @section('main')
@forelse ($urbanscape->where('id', $id) as $item)
@php // next id and previous id from masterplans table $next_id = $urbanscapes->where('id', '>', $item->id)->min('id'); $prev_id = $urbanscapes->where('id', '<', $item->id)->max('id'); @endphp
{{ $item->title }}
by {{ $item->author }} in {{ $item->city }}, {{ $item->country }}
@foreach ($collections as $col)
{{ $col->name }} Save
@endforeach
 Urbanscape  Description  Map  Masterplans  Streetscaps  Resources
{{-- --}}
@php $image0 = $item->image ?? null; @endphp
{{-- --}}
Details   Views:  {{ views($item)->count() }}
{{-- tags --}}
Tags
@foreach ($item->tags as $tag) @endforeach
{{-- data info --}}
Data Info
Author {{ $item->author }}
City {{ $item->city }}
Country {{ $item->country }}
Year {{ $item->year }}
Program {{ $item->program }}
Description

{!! $item->descriptiona !!}

{!! $item->descriptionb !!}

@php $image1 = $item->imageb ?? null; $pieces = explode(', ', $image1); @endphp

{!! $item->descriptionc !!}

@php $image1 = $item->imagec ?? null; $pieces = explode(', ', $image1); @endphp

{!! $item->descriptiond !!}

@php $image1 = $item->imaged ?? null; $pieces = explode(', ', $image1); @endphp
Map
@empty @endforelse {{-- masterplans --}}
Masterplans
The street is base on this masterplan
|
@forelse ($masterplans as $master)
{{ $master->size }}

{{ $master->title }}

{{ $master->author }}  
{{ $master->city }}, {{ $master->country }}
{{ views($master)->count() }}
@empty

Empty

dummy

@endforelse
{{-- sreetscapes section --}} @if(!$$streetscapes->isEmpty())
Streetscapes
Explore the streetscapes related to this project
|
@forelse ($streetscapes as $street)
{{ $street->size }}

{{ $street->title }}

{{ $street->address }}, {{ $street->city }}, {{ $street->country }}

{{ views($street)->count() }}
@endforelse
@endif {{-- soucrces --}}
Sources
@php $credits = explode(',', $item->credits); @endphp
    @foreach ($credits as $source)
  • {{ $source }}
    • @endforeach
{{-- urbanscapes --}}
Explore more Urbanscapes
|
@forelse ($urbanscapes as $urban)
@foreach ($urban->tags as $tag)
{{ $tag }}
@endforeach

{{ $urban->title }}

{{ $urban->city }},{{ $urban->country }}
{{ views($urban)->count() }}
@empty

Empty

dummy

@endforelse
@endsection
